resources.string: You must provide a user mail or email and a password to enter.
We can not find the user. Please check if you are using the correct email or username.
Wrong password. Please check the password you entered and try again.
You must enter all the information required in order to register in the app. Please check it and try again.
The user name you entered is already in use, please try another one.
You must enter a valid phone number.
The birth day you entered is not valid, please check it and choose the right one.
This user is alredy registered. If you forgot the password go to previous screen and click on \'Forgot Password?\'
The email address you entered is not valid, please check it.
